function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of teleconference software may lead to increased screen time and sedentary behavior.","Impact":"Potential impact on physical health and well-being due to prolonged screen time and sedentary behavior.","Mitigation":"Encourage regular breaks, movement, and posture adjustments during teleconferences. Promote physical activity outside of teleconference hours.","Technologies":"Encourage the use of software with ergonomic features and provide guidance on screen time management.","People":"Trainees, staff, and lecturers participating in teleconferences.","Owner":"Institutional administrators, educators, and conference organizers."},{"Description":"Inadequate cyber security measures and privacy concerns related to the use and storage of sensitive information on cloud accounts.","Impact":"Risk of data breaches, unauthorized access, and privacy violations leading to potential legal and ethical consequences.","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption, secure access controls, and regular security audits. Adhere to data privacy regulations and provide training on safe data handling practices.","Technologies":"Utilize secure cloud storage solutions with robust encryption and access control features. Implement multi-factor authentication for account access.","People":"Residents accessing recorded conferences, administrators managing cloud accounts, and IT personnel responsible for security measures.","Owner":"Institutional data security team, administrators, and IT department."},{"Description":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases through in-person meetings if precautions are not strictly followed.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks among trainees, staff, and lecturers.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict adherence to public health guidelines, provide personal protective equipment, and implement regular testing and health screenings. Consider rotating in-person attendance to reduce exposure risk.","Technologies":"Utilize contact tracing technology and ventilation improvement systems. Provide virtual options for participation to reduce in-person meeting attendance.","People":"Trainees, staff, and lecturers attending in-person meetings.","Owner":"Institutional health and safety committee, public health authorities, and organizational leadership."}]}
